trans-unit.target: データを返す、 <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached"> </xref>イベント。

trans-unit.source: An instance of BookmarkReachedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: BookmarkReachedEventArgs のインスタンスが作成されたときに、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>オブジェクト、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>イベント</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>を生成、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>イベントのいずれかの処理中にブックマークに到達したときに、 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>、 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>、 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>、または<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>メソッド</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: イベントをトリガーしたブックマークの場所と名前を取得するには、アクセス、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>と<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>イベントのハンドラーのプロパティ</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A></xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
trans-unit.target: オフセット、ブックマークが到達した時刻を取得します。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: イベントが発生したときに、合成エンジンのオーディオ入力ストリームの位置を返します。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
trans-unit.target: 達した、ブックマークの名前を取得します。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: ブックマークの名前の値を返します。
